subject: Cryptography
title: Data Encryption Standard (DES)
description: The Data Encryption Standard (DES) is a symmetric-key block cipher algorithm for the encryption of digital data. DES is considered insecure by modern standards and is no longer recommended for use. However, DES has a rich history as being the first encryption standard to be widely adopted.
objectives: Familiar with the history of DES
prerequisites: Basic understanding of symmetric key cryptography
Basic understanding of encryption and decryption
